attributes.action: Allow UK citizens to travel for tourism to EU for 180 days in any year.
attributes.additional_details: Many UK citizens have for many years been able to spend winter months in warmer climates. Why has this been taken away. Spain allows UK citizens to apply for some sort of visa, but our negotiators have not requested this from EU.
attributes.background: Ensure UK citizens have the same rights as EU citizens have for tourist travel I.E 180 days in any year.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the EU.

You might like to sign this petition instead

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556757
